queries.item: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ?:ab__stickers ( sticker_id mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, storefront_ids varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', position smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, status char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'A', name_for_admin varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', type char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'C', style char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'T', display_on_lists mediumtext, display_on_detailed_pages varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'full_size', output_position_list char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'T', output_position_detailed_page char(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'T', appearance mediumtext, conditions mediumtext, from_date int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, to_date int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, last_update_time int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, PRIMARY KEY (sticker_id), INDEX status (status), INDEX output_position_list (output_position_list), INDEX output_position_detailed_page (output_position_detailed_page), INDEX storefront_id (storefront_ids) ) DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ?:ab__sticker_descriptions ( sticker_id mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL, lang_code char(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', name_for_desktop varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', name_for_mobile varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', description mediumtext, PRIMARY KEY (sticker_id, lang_code) ) DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ?:ab__sticker_images ( image_id mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, sticker_id mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL default 0, lang_code char(2) NOT NULL default '', PRIMARY KEY (image_id), UNIQUE KEY sticker (sticker_id, lang_code) ) DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;
